descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Austin Rivers drives to the basket and gets the bank shot to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Austin Rivers drops in the smooth bucket) 2022/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Austin Rivers cashes in the bank shot for the Nuggets

videos.description: Aaron Gordon dishes a sweet dime to Monte Morris for the layin to extend the Nuggets' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aaron Gordon makes a sweet dime) 2022/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aaron Gordon dimes Monte Morris for the easy bucket

videos.description: JaMychal Green finishes with the two-handed flush after being served with a sweet dime from Nikola Jokic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nikola Jokic makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nikola Jokic serves up an absolute dime for the basket

videos.description: Nikola Jokic pump fakes the 3-pointer, drives to the basket and knocks down the floater for the Nuggets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nikola Jokic impresses with nice bucket) 2022/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic drives to the hole and drains the floater

videos.description: Jeff Green gets the steal and goes coast-to-coast, finishing with the and-1 basket to extend the Nuggets' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jeff Green with the and-1 bucket) 2022/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jeff Green with the epic coast-to-coast and-1 bucket
